name: No Test Drives - Car Sales Game
name_original: No Test Drives - Car Sales Game
description:
NoTestDrives is a car sales Simulation  game, Set on a Car Yard were you play through the steps of a sale while dealing with customers.

The Goal is to keep your Job for the longest time in a sitting, by selling cars. 

This is a early BETA build Created by a Car salesman loosely based on real Events.
Using the options in greeting and qualify try your best to unlock the customer's needs, to find the most suitable car, such as price, features size and style.

The greater the mood of the customer the greater chance of unlocking needs or closing the sale, your morale will impact the customers mood.
If you don't make target you will receive a written warning, get speared at 3.

Gross is saved and can be used in the main menu to unlock greater model cars.
 

If you've tick all the boxes and the customer still isn't buying?? its not necessarily a glitch its CAR SALES.
